first_reading.text:
[[1_P 5,1]]Beloved: I exhort the presbyters among you, as a fellow presbyter and witness to the sufferings of Christ and one who has a share in the glory to be revealed.
[[1_P 5,2]]Tend the flock of God in your midst, (overseeing) not by constraint but willingly, as God would have it, not for shameful profit but eagerly.
[[1_P 5,3]]Do not lord it over those assigned to you, but be examples to the flock.
[[1_P 5,4]]And when the chief Shepherd is revealed, you will receive the unfading crown of glory.
first_reading.title: First Letter of Peter

psalm.title: Psalms

gospel.text:
[[Mt 16,13]]Jesus went into the region of Caesarea Philippi and he asked his disciples, “Who do people say that the Son of Man is?”
[[Mt 16,14]]They replied, "Some say John the Baptist, others Elijah, still others Jeremiah or one of the prophets."
[[Mt 16,15]]He said to them, "But who do you say that I am?"
[[Mt 16,16]]Simon Peter said in reply, "You are the Messiah, the Son of the living God."
[[Mt 16,17]]Jesus said to him in reply, "Blessed are you, Simon son of Jonah. For flesh and blood has not revealed this to you, but my heavenly Father.
[[Mt 16,18]]And so I say to you, you are Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church, and the gates of the netherworld shall not prevail against it.
[[Mt 16,19]]I will give you the keys to the kingdom of heaven. Whatever you bind on earth shall be bound in heaven; and whatever you loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
